segments.text: Over on the left, there's a different kind of disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet labeled 'COOKIE JAR'.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs look so wobbly, and the stool is definitely tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see one hand already in the jar, grabbing those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is standing right next to him, with her hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly in on this little operation, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup looks incredibly unstable and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, he's going to take a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't noticed their quiet mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame his daring heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a coordinated effort for such young children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their sweet reward, completely ignoring the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
